title: Mortgage Loan Underwriter at Cybercoders (Tempe, AZ)
text: Source: CyberCoders Mortgage Loan Underwriter If you are a DE & VA LAPP Mortgage Loan Underwriter with at least 2 years recent mortgage underwriting experience, please read on! Top Reasons to Work with Us - Highly competitive compensation and excellent benefits!! - Great stability and work life balance - Fun and casual work environment What You Will Be Doing - Approve or deny mortgage loans, following mortgage standards, according to FHA, VA, FHLMC, Investor, QC & Bank guidelines - Review & evaluate information on loan documents to determine if buyer, property & loan conditions meet establishment & government standards - When denying a loan, specify investor & institution guidelines & basis for declining application; must be consistent with all decisions - Evaluate acceptability of loan to investors in the secondary market - Review credit reports & give loan officers & loan processors guidance on how to make the loan work - Ensure the needs of the customers are met What You Need for this Position Required: - High School Diploma or equivalent - 5 years mortgage industry experience with at least two years in mortgage underwriting - Good communication skills - Must be detail oriented, organized, and analytical - Knowledge of CalyxPoint & VA LAPP & FHA DE authority - Must successfully pass background investigation & drug screen according to company policy - Must get along with co-workers & work effectively in a team work environment So, if you are a DE & VA LAPP Mortgage Loan Underwriter with at least 2 years recent mortgage underwriting experience, please apply today! - Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Your Right to Work – In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
